page.title: 05FARMING
page.content: The FENS have a very rich soil which allows a wide variety of ARABLE farming.The major crops are:wheat, barley,sugar beet,potatoes, peas, cabbages and cauliflowers.A number of farms have acres of fruit e.g.apples, pears,plums,strawberries and blackberries.Many of the farms have some acres under glass.These nurseries vary from one greenhouse up to 25 acres in size.For most of the farmers the period around Christmas is the quietest but all of them say that with modern machinery and facilties the work can be spread out over a twelve month period.Although some of the produce,especially fruit,finds its way to local markets,many of the crops are grown for markets outside the fens.
